name: Henry
body:
### Welcome to the Henry github pages.
Henry is a Raspberry Pi Zero powered robot with a simple web interface for remote control. Henry was inspired by PiWars and the Zerobot feature in MagPi Magazine Issue 40 (Pi Zero launch edition)

### Basic Robot Components
Henry uses most of the components featured in the zerobot article. Namely these are:
* [PiZero](https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/pi-zero/) 
* [2 x 28BYJ-48 Stepper Motors](http://4tronix.co.uk/store/index.php?rt=product/product&path=65&product_id=196)
* [2 x ULN2003A Motor Drivers](http://4tronix.co.uk/store/index.php?rt=product/product&path=65&product_id=196)

In addition to this Henry also uses:
* [90 degree 40 pin header](http://thepihut.com/products/raspberry-pi-zero-essential-kit)
* [Raspberry Pi WiFi Dongle](https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/usb-wifi-dongle/)
* [Henry desktop hoover](http://www.amazon.co.uk/Henry-Hetty-PP2500HH-Desktop-Cleaner/dp/B00KRG8BPS)
* [Motor compatible wheels](http://4tronix.co.uk/store/index.php?rt=product/product&keyword=wheels&product_id=176)
* [Mobile phone battery pack](http://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/product/B005QI1A8C)
* various cables, nuts bolts etc.
